players

Class Racer

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.Player
      • players.Racer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Helot, Perioikoi, Spartiate

    public class Racer
extends Player
    Child of Player. It has new attribute: energy and eliminated appropriate for a racing game.
    Author:
    d_carrer

      • pickCardFortune

        public java.lang.String pickCardFortune(Deck_of_Fortune deck)

      • spinWheelFortune

        public java.lang.String spinWheelFortune(Wheel_of_Fortune wheel)
